last_episode_to_air.overview: Imogen smuggles Adilah to England to see Michael, in the hope that answers will finally be given. Max and Malik must work together and follow as her only back up.
last_episode_to_air.name: The Cottage

name: The Veil
overview: Two women play a deadly game of truth and lies on the road from Istanbul to Paris and London. One woman has a secret, the other a mission to reveal it before thousands of lives are lost. In the shadows, mission controllers at the CIA and French DGSE must put differences aside and work together to avert potential disaster.
tagline: Behind every lie is a truth waiting to be told.

episodes.name: The Camp
episodes.overview: Imogen visits a refugee camp in the remote mountains on the Turkish and Syrian border. Amongst the chaos, she seeks out Adilah, who has been separated and detained from the rest of the refugees.

episodes.name: Crossing the Bridge
episodes.overview: Imogen and Adilah continue on their journey to Paris and face a threat in Istanbul. Meanwhile, the pressure mounts on the CIA and DGSE to determine the true identity of the "Djinn al Raqqa."

episodes.name: The Asset
episodes.overview: Imogen reunites Adilah with her daughter in Paris as truth and lies become further blurred.

episodes.name: Declassified
episodes.overview: Amidst the increased threat on her daughter's life, Adilah reveals a secret to Imogen. Max must deal with the consequences of Emir's arrival in Paris.

episodes.name: Grandfather's House
episodes.overview: As the jigsaw puzzle becomes clearer to Imogen, she takes matters into her own hands. Max resorts to drastic measures whilst Emir puts pressure on Adilah.

episodes.name: The Cottage
episodes.overview: Imogen smuggles Adilah to England to see Michael, in the hope that answers will finally be given. Max and Malik must work together and follow as her only back up.
